About me

I trip, I fall.
I drive, I swear.
I check grades, I cry.

I am just like anyone else you know except I try to be a special little snowflake in midday summer. I am a student at UC Berkeley who studies computer science and listens a lot to others and the world around me. And then, I ponder. This blog is the result - 5% ideas/conclusions, 95% whitespace.
